shortDescription: Incorrect permission assignment for critical resource issue exists in UD-LT1 firmware Ver.2.1.8 and earlier and UD-LT1/EX firmware Ver.2.1.8 and earlier. If an attacker with the guest account of the affected products accesses a specific file, the information containing credentials may be obtained.
vulnerabilityName: UD-LT1 and UD-LT1/EX Firmware Guest Account Credential Disclosure
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
